languages.text: "Мон-кай избрал{mf||а} твою судьбу — пусть это будет тебе уроком. Сложи оружие и ступай вслед за стражей, и пусть жалость низщего существа послужит тебе клеймом позора много большим, чем гнев совета архонтов. Прочь!"

traits.locale_text: "Мон-кай избрал{mf||а} твою судьбу — пусть это будет тебе уроком. Сложи оружие и ступай вслед за стражей, и пусть жалость низщего существа послужит тебе клеймом позора много большим, чем гнев совета архонтов. Прочь!"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай избрал{mf||а} твою судьбу — пусть это будет тебе уроком. Сложи оружие и ступай вслед за стражей, и пусть жалость низщего существа послужит тебе клеймом позора много большим, чем гнев совета архонтов. Прочь!"

traits.locale_text: "The mon'keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. May this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the archons. Begone!"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

traits.locale_text: "The mon'keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. May this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the archons. Begone!"

traits.locale_text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"

traits.locale_text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

traits.locale_text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: “这只猴子已经决定了你的命运，玛拉斋。希望你能从这件事情中吸取教训。放下武器，跟着卫兵离开吧。希望来自劣等种族的怜悯，比执政官的愤怒更能让你感到耻辱。快走吧！”
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"

traits.locale_text: “这只猴子已经决定了你的命运，玛拉斋。希望你能从这件事情中吸取教训。放下武器，跟着卫兵离开吧。希望来自劣等种族的怜悯，比执政官的愤怒更能让你感到耻辱。快走吧！”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイはお前の運命を決定した、マラズハイ。良い教訓となるだろう。武器を置いて衛兵の後を付いていき、劣等種の哀れみをもってアーコンの怒りよりも遥かに不名誉な印を受けよ。さあ、行け！」
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイはお前の運命を決定した、マラズハイ。良い教訓となるだろう。武器を置いて衛兵の後を付いていき、劣等種の哀れみをもってアーコンの怒りよりも遥かに不名誉な印を受けよ。さあ、行け！」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} mon-keigh ha decidido tu destino, Marazhai. Aprende de esta experiencia. Suelta tus armas, sigue a los guardias y que la misericordia de un ser inferior sea una marca de desgracia mucho mayor que la ira de los Arcontes. ¡Márchate!».
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} mon-keigh ha decidido tu destino, Marazhai. Aprende de esta experiencia. Suelta tus armas, sigue a los guardias y que la misericordia de un ser inferior sea una marca de desgracia mucho mayor que la ira de los Arcontes. ¡Márchate!».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: « {mf|Le|La} mon-keigh a décidé de votre sort, Marazhai. Que cela vous serve de leçon. Déposez vos armes, suivez les gardes, et que la miséricorde d'un être inférieur vous inflige un déshonneur plus grand encore que la colère des archontes. Disparaissez ! »
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le|La} mon-keigh a décidé de votre sort, Marazhai. Que cela vous serve de leçon. Déposez vos armes, suivez les gardes, et que la miséricorde d'un être inférieur vous inflige un déshonneur plus grand encore que la colère des archontes. Disparaissez ! »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "{mf|Der|Die} Chem-Pan-Sey hat Euer Schicksal bestimmt, Marazhai. Lasst Euch das eine Lehre sein. Legt Eure Waffe nieder und folgt den Wachen. Möge das Mitleid eines niederen Wesens für Euch eine Schande sein, die weit schwerer wiegt als der Zorn der Archonten. Geht!"
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der|Die} Chem-Pan-Sey hat Euer Schicksal bestimmt, Marazhai. Lasst Euch das eine Lehre sein. Legt Eure Waffe nieder und folgt den Wachen. Möge das Mitleid eines niederen Wesens für Euch eine Schande sein, die weit schwerer wiegt als der Zorn der Archonten. Geht!"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Mon-keigh, kaderini seçti Marazhai. Bu sana bir ders olsun. Silahını indir ve muhafızları takip et. Aşağı bir varlık sana duyacağı acıma duygusu, onuruna Arkonların gazabından çok daha büyük yara versin. Git!"
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has chosen your fate, Marazhai. Let this be a lesson to you. Lay down your weapon, follow the guards, and may the pity of a lesser being serve as a mark of disgrace far worse than the wrath of the Archons. Go!"

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh kaderini seçti Marazhai. Bu sana bir ders olsun. Silahını indir, muhafızları takip et ve aşağı bir varlığın sana acıması, onuruna Arkonların gazabından çok daha büyük yara versin. Git!"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect
